flawed_nl_solution:
The tree has been planted for 9 - 4 = <<9-4=5>>5 years
It will take another 7 - 5 = <<7-5=6>>6 years for it to bear fruit
Lydia will be 9 + 6 = <<9+6=15>>15 years old
#### 15

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
